name: Marionette Company 2 Chu!
overview: Marionette Company 2 is the sequel to the adventure simulation game that was also released for the Dreamcast console. Despite your status as a high school malcontent, Micro Cabin deems teenagers capable of improving the logical capacity and design of a sophisticated marionette named Marina. With technical know-how and astute conversation, players teach Marina about the ways of the world and attempt to guide her to becoming a self-sufficient individual. All this while attending school and interacting with classmates. The game features japanese voice acting for all the game characters and unlockable galleries with pictures of all the girls that can be unlocked with the memory card saved games of the main game.
